1: <pb/><t>Ex vuninal, chaec eyab' in lolonel svala'. Maclejec eyab'i yic vach' ol jelanb'oc e pensar yuuj.</t>
2: <t>A c'ayb'ub'al te vach' svac' d'ayex, yuj chi' tzeyailejn̈ej d'a masanil tiempo.</t>
3: <t>Ayic quelem unin in, ayinto ec' d'a yol spat in mam, yelxo val xajanab'il in yuj ix in nun.</t>
4: <t>A d'a jun tiempoal chi', icha tic ajnac yac'an in c'ayb'ub'al vin̈ in mam. Yalannac vin̈ icha tic: Sic'can in lolonel tic d'a a pensar, c'anab'ajej tas sval tic, yic vach' ay a q'uinal.</t>
5: <t>Cha a jelanil yed' a vach' pensaril, man̈ ac'b'at in lolonel tic satc'olal.</t>
6: <t>Xajanej a jelanil, man̈ a patiquejeli, yujto ol ach colchaj yuuj.</t>
7: <t>Yovalil tza sayec' jelanil d'a junjun c'u. Vach'chom ajaltac tz'aj yilchaj uuj, palta te vach' ama tato a tza b'ab'laj sayejec' d'a yichan̈ juntzan̈xo tas ay d'ayach.</t>
8: <t>Nib'ejoch jelanil, yic vach' ol ach ic'jocchaan̈ yuuj, yic vach' nivan ol aj elc'och d'a yol sat eb' etanimail.</t>
9: <t>A yuj jelanil chi', vach' ol ach elc'ochoc, ol och q'uelan eb' anima yuj a jelanil chi', xchican vin̈ in mam chi' d'ayin.</t>
10: <t>Axo ticnaic ach vuninal, cha val ab' juntzan̈ in lolonel tic, yic vach' ol najatb'oc a q'uinal.</t>
11: <t>A in ol ach vic' b'ey d'a sb'eyb'al eb' jelan, ol vac'an a b'eyb'alej tojolal.</t>
12: <t>A d'a tojol b'eyb'al chi', malaj tas ol ach yamanoch vaan, vach'chom yelc'olal ol ach b'atoc, palta man̈ ol ach telvoclaj.</t>
13: <t>Ac'och a pensar d'a c'ayb'ub'al tic, man̈ a patiquejeli. Yelxo val tza b'eyb'alej yic vach' ay a q'uinal.</t>
14: <t>Man̈ ach b'at tzac'an d'a spatic eb' chuc sb'eyb'al, man̈ a c'ulej icha tas sc'ulej eb'.</t>
15: <t>B'esel a b'a d'a scal eb', ac' ip a b'eyb'alan vach'il.</t>
16: <t>Max ochlaj svayan̈ eb' tato max sc'ulej chucal eb', max yic'laj yip eb', tato malaj junoc mach syixtej eb'.</t>
17: <t>A chucal yed' ixtoj anima, a juntzan̈ chi' svael eb' yaji.</t>
18: <t>A sb'eyb'al eb' tojol spensar, lajan icha ayic vanto sacb'i masanto sq'ue c'u, scheclaj spatic yichan̈ eb' yuuj.</t>
19: <t>Axo sb'eyb'al eb' chuc spensar jun, lajan icha yic tzon̈ b'eyec' d'a scal q'uic'alq'uinal, man̈ chequeloc b'aj sco tenoch coc.</t>
20: <t>Ach vuninal, cha ab' in lolonel tic, maclej val ab' sic'lab'il.</t>
21: <t>Mocab' iq'uel a sat d'ay, sic'can d'a a pensar,</t>
22: <t>yujto a juntzan̈ lolonel tic tz'ac'an sq'uinal eb' tz'ilchaj yuuj.</t>
23: <t>Tza ya'ilej a pensar d'a yichan̈ masanil tastac ay d'a yolyib'an̈q'uinal tic, yujto a a pensar chi' tzach cuchb'an d'a vach'il, ma d'a chucal.</t>
24: <t>Man̈ esalvumoc tzutej a b'a, man̈ a comon alej pax chucal lolonel.</t>
25: <t>Te tojoln̈ej tzach b'at d'a ichan̈ d'a sb'eal vach'il, man̈ ach b'at q'uelan d'a tas malaj svach'il.</t>
26: <t>Tza ya'ilej val tas tza c'ulej icha val co sic'lan co b'e b'aj tzon̈ b'eyi, aocab' val sb'eal vach'il b'aj tzach ochi.</t>
27: <t>Man̈ ach elcan d'a jun b'e te tojol, man̈ ach b'atcan d'a sb'eal chucal.</t>
